Uses of Package
graphicslib3D

  • Packages that use graphicslib3D 
    Package Description
    graphicslib3D  
    graphicslib3D.editors  
    graphicslib3D.light  
    graphicslib3D.shape  
  • Classes in graphicslib3D used by graphicslib3D 
    Class and Description
    ControlMesh
    This class defines a 4x4 array of "control points" -- Point3D objects which represent the control points for a cubic Bezier surface.
    ICamera
    ICamera specifies the interface to be implemented by a "UVN" camera.
    ISurfacePatch
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "SurfacePatchDialog" class.
    Material
    This class encapsulates the material parameters of Materials in OpenGL.
    Matrix3D
    Defines a 3D (4x4) matrix for general transformations.
    MatrixStack
    This class defines a Stack for managing hierarchical collections of Matrix3D transformations.
    Point3D
    Defines a three-dimensional homogeneous point.
    Quaternion
    This class defines a quaternion -- an object representing an orientation in space.
    Shape3D.DRAW_MODE
    The choices for how the displayed object should look.
    Shape3D.RENDER_METHOD
    The choices for the underlying hardware method which should be used to to draw the object.
    Vector3D
    Defines a three-dimensional vector.
    Vertex3D
    Defines a 3D vertex.
  • Classes in graphicslib3D used by graphicslib3D.editors 
    Class and Description
    ControlMesh
    This class defines a 4x4 array of "control points" -- Point3D objects which represent the control points for a cubic Bezier surface.
    IQuarterPatch
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "QuarterPatchDialog" class.
    ISurfacePatch
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by classes in order to be editable by the "SurfacePatchDialog" class.
    Matrix3D
    Defines a 3D (4x4) matrix for general transformations.
    Point3D
    Defines a three-dimensional homogeneous point.
    Shape3D
    Defines the abstract base class from which 3D shapes are derived.
  • Classes in graphicslib3D used by graphicslib3D.light 
    Class and Description
    Point3D
    Defines a three-dimensional homogeneous point.
    Vector3D
    Defines a three-dimensional vector.
  • Classes in graphicslib3D used by graphicslib3D.shape 
    Class and Description
    Shape3D
    Defines the abstract base class from which 3D shapes are derived.
    Vertex3D
    Defines a 3D vertex.
